featured.text: The additional tines made diners less likely to drop food, and the curved tines served as a scoop so people did not have to constantly switch to a spoon while eating.
The user has to spend additional money for it.
As the world population continues to grow, shortages of fresh water will occur more often and the need for additional water supplies will become critical.

definition.en_def: Something that is added to what is already present or available.
definition.example: She requested additional time to complete the project.
